products.name: Github Marker
products.tagline: A chrome extention to Favorite, Bookmark & Mark link as Read in Github
products.description:
There are a lot of links provided on Github pages. Some might need to be marked as read, some might be amazing & some you would love to read it later. Github Marker does exactly that.
The extension provides 3 options attached to every link found on Github related pages/URLs:
1. Mark as Read/Unread
2. Favorite/Un-Favorite a link
3. Bookmark/Unbookmark a link

products.name: Note Box
products.taglineV0: A Chrome extension to store notes for every domain
products.tagline: A chrome extension to add notes/todos based on URL
products.description:
A Chrome Extension that provides an environment for every domain/URL. Revisit the notes when back to that URL or access it from `Homepage`.
No Login/Signup.
All the notes are stored in the browser memory.

products.name: File Ops
products.tagline: A VS Code extension to easily tag/alias files & quick switch between files
products.description: Sometimes there are files which have the same names. ex. index.js. File Ops helps in `tagging` or `aliasing` files. These files can be Viewed & Opened from the tree view or using commands. Another feature is to be able to quickly switch between example.js and example.css.
